outputs.output_descr: The project responds to the emerging priority of the Government on explosive remnant of war/abandoned explosive ordnance hotspots clearance and obsolete ammunition stockpile disposal. The main components of the project relate to upgrading disposal safety standards to international level, enlarging the demilitarization framework to include civil community safety and broadening the mine victim assistance scheme to target all explosive ordnance victims in Albania. It will also continue to provide technical assistance to the Government, in complying with disarmament conventions obligations.

project_descr: Coordination and monitoring of humanitarian mine action, hotspots clearance and ammunition stockpile disposal in Albania
project_title: Albanian Mine Action and Ammunition Disposal
